root.name: Red Invasion: Tower Defense Blitzkrieg
root.description: OverviewRed Invasion: Tower Defense Blitzkrieg is a tower defense game developed and published by Milkstone Studios for the Xbox Live Indie Games platform.Red Invasion: Tower Defense Blitzkrieg is the sequel to the original Red Invasion: Tower Defense.GameplayRed Invasion: Tower Defense Blitzkrieg is a basic tower defense game. Players place turrets along a set path that the enemies travel on. Players try and take out all of the enemies before they reach the end of the road.Red Invasion: Tower Defense Blitzkrieg build upon the original game, adding forty new missions and some new turret types.
